* new & improved SKIP feature: After dying 10 times you now can skip the level easily
* Do you like „Freeze!“? Please rate the game to support the development of the sequel!

* new language: Thai
* new language: Brasilian Portuguese
* 64Bit support for the newest devices
* improved Freeze button functionality
